title: Data Scientist at SAP
summary: Tomas is dedicated, persistent and organized. He excels in communication and loves problem-solving in team environments.

experience.title: Robotics Deep ML Researcher
experience.description: Trained MaskRCNN to identify building features from orthomosaic images of Texas Terafactory gathered from drone flyovers. Packaged model, deploying to microservice that accepts orthomosaic images and returns coordinates of targeted building features. Worked with Boston Dynamics Spot robot to autonomously gather high res point cloud information from the Fremont Factory.

experience.title: Software Engineer
experience.description: - Increased car sales by improving UX for internal marketing teams through providing in depth fleet analysis and marketing tools. - Migrated used vehicle listing from inefficient manual system to streamlined automated UI and implemented cross border listings. - Increased testing capabilities and automated regression performance of inventory backend with improved logging and simulation.

experience.title: Full-stack Developer
experience.description: - Assemble custom, interactive arduino hardware used to engage students in STEM. Debug, assess, and recalibrate malfunctioning units before shipping. - Improve website experience and streamline UI by reorganizing layout and implementing user-persistent changes to facilitate expedited setup.

experience.title: VP of Sustainabilty
experience.description: Manage, organize and execute community wide waste reform measures by providing education, incentives and support to all 35+ fraternities. Cooperate with PHC VP of sustainability to unify efforts within the entire Cal Greeks community and streamline mutually beneficial efforts.

experience.title: Construction Laborer
experience.description: Worked closely with a professional contractor to absorb the skills of the trade. Spent long hours demolishing houses, redoing floors, and placing studs. Refined my work ethic, tested my persistence, and stoked my ambition by being exposed to grueling manual labor for unending hours.

experience.company: Associated Students of the University of California
experience.title: Sustainability Manager to Office of Senator Alexander Wilfert
experience.description: - Work with companies to supply 30,000 cups per month in shipments of 300,000 units that need to be stored and distributed cost-effectively. - Study environmental impacts of solo cups compared to compostable cups at an international level to uphold rigorous sustainability standards

experience.title: Research Assistant at Liwei Lin labs
